typeDescriptions.typeString: struct MockWitnetRequestsBoard.DataRequest storage ref[] storage ref

devdoc.author: Witnet Foundation
devdoc.details: This contract enables posting requests that Witnet bridges will insert into the Witnet network. The result of the requests will be posted back to this contract by the bridge nodes too.

isUpgradable(address).details: Verifies if the contract is upgradable.

postDataRequest(bytes,uint256).details: Posts a data request into the WRB in expectation that it will be relayed and resolved in Witnet with a total reward that equals to msg.value.

params._dr: The bytes corresponding to the Protocol Buffers serialization of the data request output.
params._tallyReward: The amount of value that will be detracted from the transaction value and reserved for rewarding the reporting of the final result (aka tally) of the data request.

returns._0: The unique identifier of the data request.

readDrHash(uint256).details: Retrieves hash of the data request transaction in Witnet.

params._id: The unique identifier of the data request.

returns._0: The hash of the DataRequest transaction in Witnet.

readResult(uint256).details: Retrieves the result (if already available) of one data request from the WRB.

params._id: The unique identifier of the data request.

reportDrHash(uint256,uint256).details: Reports the hash of a data request in Witnet.

params._id: The unique identifier of the data request.

reportResult(uint256,bytes).details: Reports the result of a data request in Witnet.

params._id: The unique identifier of the data request.

upgradeDataRequest(uint256,uint256).details: Increments the rewards of a data request by adding more value to it. The new request reward will be increased by msg.value minus the difference between the former tally reward and the new tally reward.

params._id: The unique identifier of the data request.
params._tallyReward: The new tally reward. Needs to be equal or greater than the former tally reward.

devdoc.title: Witnet Requests Board mocked

userdoc.notice: Contract to bridge requests to Witnet for testing purposes.
